page.title: 01Introduction to grid area
page.content:
This grid area is in Fife, Scotland. In this grid area there is one town, Lochgelly, covering approximately 1 square kilometer and the small village of Glencraig.
The surrounding countryside is mainly farmland with 1 square kilometer of inland water, mainly Loch Ore and 2 small streams,R.Ore and Lochfitty Burn.
There is also an area known as Lochore Meadows Country Park, which has been created from abandoned mine workings.
The rest of the grid area is open countryside with 7 farms.
